title: Episode 93: Lorena Bobbitt: Part 1
description:
What began as a young woman’s American dream come true ended in a nightmare that would become internationally known in headlines, on the covers of tabloids, and broadcast on every major news network. But the true story behind the punchline was even more horrifying than the media ever explained.
Support Sinisterhood
